entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lac-Mégantic
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
